update np_domain_custom
customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
domain = #{domain,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
introduce = #{introduce,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
use_flag = #{useFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
